title: Draven bobble head animations.
body: Please allow us to turn the dumb draven bobble head off.

replies.body: Not to mention is lasts till the 4th....Bought 2 new skins and have to look at this bobblehead crap for DAYS. Ugh.
yeah pls do that its realy annoying sometimes

I agree, I bought a new skin that I want to use and I gotta deal with a annoying af Draven head override. they should atleast have a setting or something to disable it ...

I guess its riot's way of forcing people to play ranked lol.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Its annoying and distracting. Haha we get it. Was funny for the first 5 min. Now it's frustrating.

This has been the most stupid event I have ever seen in any video game I have ever played. It got so annoying in the matches I played yesterday that I just logged off mid game. Told my team mates before hand. Sure I was reported, when I logged on I get the LeaveBuster Warning that I need to write "I agree" not to quit or go afk. I will wait till after its over before I do the acknowledgement. Im not going to play LoL whilst its on anyway so there is no point typing "I accept" because if I start a game and there are Draven bobble heads I will just quit again.
Is there sesriously no way to do that? I have been AFK looking for how you do that for ages now :(
